definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Laibin city police in Guangxi broke up a gambling ring running a racket called "mark-six lottery".
sentences.chinese: 来宾市警方粉碎了一个六合彩赌博集团。

sentences.english: It' s a development of Big Boss.
sentences.chinese: 是“大老板”的升六合彩网站级。

sentences.english: Of course, there is a more serious side to the lottery.
sentences.chinese: 当然，六合彩不仅是娱乐。

sentences.english: We expect there will be lots of people going to buy tickets due to the snowballing jackpot.
sentences.chinese: 由于累积奖金丰厚，预期会有很多买今期的六合彩。

sentences.english: Strangely my heart is drawn to the side of this plum tree.
sentences.chinese: 偶然间心似缱，在六合彩太阳图库梅树边。

sentences.english: Wealth has little fortune, u might buy some lottery.
sentences.chinese: 财运方面有点小横财，不妨买点六合彩。

sentences.english: There are multitudes whose life is nothing but a continual lottery. (No. 182)
sentences.chinese: 大多数人的生活除了不断地指望赢六合彩，别无其他。

sentences.english: He said he was celebrating not winning a lottery prize.
sentences.chinese: 他说他正在为没有赢得六合彩而欢庆。
“我们就像赢了六合彩”，哈科特说。

definition: to win a prize/a successful gamble
